Package org.zend.webapi.internal.core.connection.request

Class Summary
AbstractRequest  
ClusterAddServerRequest Add a new server to the cluster.
ClusterDisableServerRequest Disable a cluster member.
ClusterEnableServerRequest Re-enable a cluster member.
ClusterGetServerStatusRequest Get the list of servers in the cluster and the status of each one.
ClusterRemoveServerRequest Remove a server from the cluster.
ConfigurationExportRequest Export the current server / cluster configuration into a file.
ConfigurationImportRequest Import a saved configuration snapshot into the server.
GetSystemInfoRequest Get information about the system, including Zend Server edition and version, PHP version, licensing information etc.
HeaderParameters Used to hold all request headers
MultipartRepresentation Defines the multipart/form- data, which can be used by a wide variety of applications and transported by a wide variety of protocols as a way of returning a set of values as the result of a user filling out a form.
RestartPhpRequest Restart PHP on all servers or on specified servers in the cluster.
